nodes.text: Blak was a male individual who worked for the organization of the Oblee crime lord Nirama during the waning years of the Galactic Republic. After Blak was caught selling a cargo to the Blood Velkers, Nirama had him strung up and used as a dummy, for members of his organization to practice their blade drill on. A male Corellian who had served under Blak later mentioned his commander's fate while having a conversation in the cantina Krakin's Alehouse on the planet Cularin.
Blak was created by Morrie Mullins and received a brief mention in Remember When, article that was added to Wizards.com in 2005 as part of the Living Force campaign.
